transcripts.text: Okay, let's do this.  Thank you, Madam Secretary, for joining us to discuss the Department of Education's 2020 budget proposal.
Thank you for this opportunity to testify.  I look forward to your questions.

Calm down.  You've made some controversial requests, to say the very least, so let me go ahead and get right to the most questionable.  On page 39, you propose firing all teachers and replacing them with Christmas trees.  Can you elaborate on that?
Thank you, Chairwoman, for that question.  Actually, the data that we have shows very...
Reclaiming my time!

My time is up.  I yield to my colleague.  Thank you.  Hey, Betts, it's me again.  Your proposal also calls for major cuts, including, this must be a typo, almost $18 million in federal funding for the Special Olympics.
Yes, that's correct.
Really?  Wow, you're going to hell.
Well, sir, we have continued to retain the funding levels for IDEA and held that level.

Cruella DeVos, Cruella DeVos Of basic brain function, she suffers a loss.  She might be even dumber than her boss Cruella DeVos, where kids are concerned, she'll proudly admit.  If they're underprivileged, she don't give a shit.  Our education system's screwed because of Betsy Cruella DeVos.  She can't be bothered learning information.
I'm not familiar with that.
Couldn't fill a symbol with her thoughts.
So the the paychecks souvenirs.

she bathes in teachers tears and burns up school supplies to fuel her yacht.  She steps on the poor to boost VIPs In her own profession, she's earned no degrees.  So hide your children if you come across.  Cruella, Cruella de Vos.
You also recommend textbooks with no pages and, quote, kicking old ladies just for fun.
We had to make difficult decisions in the budget.
She might be the worst that ever was.  Cruella DeVos.
Betsy DeVos taking heat on Capitol Hill.  We'll certainly look into that.

Her hair never moves.  Her eyes never blink.  Why?  She starts to perspire when she has to think.  Her head is full of lies and applesauce.  Cruella DeVos.  You know she eats babies, don't play.  Her grammar ain't great.  Cause Betsy can't spell.  The Special Olympics can go right to hell.  To anyone in need, she says no more.
Isn't it awful, darling?

From Betsy Cruella DeVos.  She's got no time for public education.  She's out of touch and lacks all basic skills.  She buys all her careers She lies through her veneers And blows her nose with hundred dollar bills.  Everybody!  She's callous and cruel Synthetically sweet Unethical, shameless, aloof, and elite.  This song's too short to list all of the flaws.  Of bets, I mean Cruella de Vos.
She's so dumb.
That's it.
